channel.title: Skillcape emote help
channel.description: I want to make it so when you type ::cape it does the skillcape emote...so?How do i make it so that it does different emotes depending on what cape your wearing, i know your not supposed to spoonfeed me...but you wouldn't have to if there was a fuckin guide.

item.title: Skillcape emote help
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:

if (command.startsWith("skillcape") && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2677) { setAnimation(405); stillgfx(282, absY, absX); } else if playerEquipment[playercape] == 2678 {
finish yourself
